item.title: A-Z Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
A-Z Social Media Manager

Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled, tasteful, and reliable social media expert to join our team. This is a long-term and full time position for someone who is thorough, detail-oriented, and passionate about creating high-quality content. Flexible schedule including evenings and weekends when necessary as well as the ability to work during Los Angeles timezone is important. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in cinematic and minimalist design, video/photo editing, and social media strategy. You will be responsible for managing our social media presence across various platforms, including Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube, to build a strong online community and drive engagement and sales.

Responsibilities:
1. Video Editing:
   - Edit videos for YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram Reels to create engaging and high-quality content.

2. Content Creation:
   - Create visually appealing Instagram Carousels and Stories.
   - Retouch videos and photos to maintain a high standard of quality.

3. Content Strategy:
   - Plan and strategize content ideas to align with our brand and marketing goals.
   - Develop and execute content calendars.

4. Daily Posting:
   - Post content daily across various social media platforms.

5. Community Building:
   - Build and manage a Facebook Group to foster a strong community.

6. Sales Funnels:
   - Execute and optimize sales funnels to convert followers into customers.

7. Copywriting:
   - Write engaging captions, comments, and blogs to enhance engagement.

8. Hashtag Strategy:
   - Utilize effective hashtags for Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok to increase reach and visibility.

9. Audience Growth:
   - Implement strategies to gain true fans, followers, and high engagement in comments.

10. Advertising:
    - Manage Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube ads to drive traffic and conversions.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
- Strong portfolio demonstrating skills in video editing, photo retouching, and content creation.
- Excellent understanding of minimalist design principles.
- Proficiency in using social media management tools and analytics.
- Exceptional writing skills with the ability to craft engaging captions and blogs.
- In-depth knowledge of social media platforms, trends, and best practices.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Strong organizational and multitasking skills.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with social media advertising and campaign management.
- Knowledge of SEO and content marketing strategies.
- Familiarity with graphic design tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Canva.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role. Include a Loom video of yourself walking us through examples of your work, particularly those that showcase your social media, digital marketing, video editing, photo retouching, and content creation skills.

We look forward to building a long-term relationship with a talented social media expert who can help us elevate our brand and engage with our audience effectively.



Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:01 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, Canva, LinkedIn, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Advertising
Skills: TikTok, Canva, LinkedIn, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Advertising
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Edit Meta Ad from Long Video - Upwork
item.description:
Watch this 20min video and pick out 5 hooks you think will perform well.

Other requirements:
- Supply both 9x16 and 1x1
- Length to be between 30sec and 3min
- Add captions to both specs and ensure all spelling is correct
- Ensure no heads are cropped
- Add subtitles in safe zones
- Use/lead with emotive moments where possible
- Edit out any pauses in between talking
- Add text overlay to opening frame
- One of the 5 versions at least to start with the Menopause line ("I guess I was going through Menopause", but with different body to this V1
- Provide different thumbnail options to test

Raw file: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/8p7ethw4qykjto9f6h80e/WelleCo-Shell-House-Chemist-Warehouse-event-V1.mov?rlkey=9ab00sbe3cc183g2qkt7xihsc&dl=0

Final output:
5 paid ad videos (10 total with specs)
3 different thumbnail options in both specs

Budget: $50
Posted On: July 01, 2024 22:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video editor needed to shorten content for testimonial - Upwork
item.description:
I have a video from a customer of our company. Each video is about 10 minutes long.

I need a video editor to do the following:
-Shorten the video to 2 minutes
-Focus the content in the video on what is good about our company, removing references to other companies, but keeping some personal information about the customer to humanize them
-Crop the video to remove me from it
-Add closed-captioning in English
-Add company logo (I will provide)

I anticipate the video will take 1 hour to fully edit.

I am looking to finish the video by July 8.

Hourly range of $10-30. Intermediate. One-time project.
Skills: Video editing | Testimonial video | English


Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 21:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Testimonial Video
Skills: Video Editing, Testimonial Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Actor/Spokesperson needed for video ads - Upwork
item.description:
Our company is always looking for great UGC style spokesperson video ads and we currently are looking to make multiple hires.

This will be a one time gig with the potential for future consistent work.

The current role we need to fill is ideally a male, mid 30s or older.
However, we absolutely take on anyone and everyone as we have other roles as well.

We will simply give you a short video ad script to film and we'll take care of all the editing.

If interested, please just submit 1-2 samples of past video projects so we can see if you're a good fit.

Thanks!

Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 21:40 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking For An Experienced YT Voice Over Artist For an NFL Football Channel(100 projects for $1500) - Upwork
item.description:
This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
You will be responsible for narrating 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly.   The bigger the channel grows, the better our Team does!!  We all WIN!!

Examples:
Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you:
1. BLITZ - https://www.youtube.com/@BlitzHQ
2. FIELDFLIX - https://www.youtube.com/@fieldflix
3. REDZONE - https://www.youtube.com/@redzoneyt-/videos
4. DIME(a basketball version of what i would like to create for NFL Football) - https://www.youtube.com/@dime-/videos


Budget: $1,500

item.title: Animated 30 Conceptual Video - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone to create an animated video based on a basic script that we've provided. It is a conceptual video explaining the value prop of our product.

I have a working script that you can find here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mPJZV9aXvQKlnI7RNGw3R5YkYKr38_uewjNqJrrZPS4/edit?usp=sharing

In the script, I've included:
1. Visual examples of the animation style
2. A script and shot list
3. A voiceover track.

We are looking for this video to be about 30 seconds long.

Please let me know if you are interested in the project and I can start up a contract.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 21:30 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Explainer Video, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Video Animation, Motion Design, Animated Explainer, Video Production, Promotional Video, UI Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Logo Animation, Video Editing
